wikitext.*:
'''Anna Adamczyk-Śliwińska''' 'Nifrodel' is editor in chief and one of the founders of The Polish Tolkienists Almanac ''[[Aiglos (journal)|Aiglos]]'', from [[November]] [[2004]] till present.<ref>The editors of ''Aiglos'' http://aiglos.tolkien.com.pl/english/issues.php (accessed 3 September 2016)</ref> She is also a member of the ''Parmadili'', [[Sekcja Tolkienowska ŚKF|The Tolkien Section of the Silesian Fantasy Club]].<ref>Members of the ''Parmadili'' http://parmadili.skf.org.pl/osekcji.htm (accessed 3 September 2016)</ref>


==Bibliography==

===Articles===

* [[2005]]: ''[[Aiglos Special Issue I|Aiglos Special Issue]]''
** "Tolkien and Nature"
** Poetry
* [[2011]]: ''[[Aiglos 15]]''
** Poetry
* [[2012]]: ''[[Aiglos Special Issue II]]''
** "Word, power and will – magic in the writings of J.R.R. Tolkien"
** Poetry

===Reviews===
* [[2005]]: ''[[Aiglos Special Issue I|Aiglos Special Issue]]''
** ''An Outline of the Theology of Middle-earth''
* [[2011]]: ''[[Aiglos 15]]''
** L.E. Jones, ''Myth and Middle-earth, Exploring the Legends Behind J.R.R. Tolkien’s The Hobbit and The Lord of the Rings'' ("Second-rate Writing, or How to Make Money on Tolkien")
* [[2012]]: ''[[Aiglos Special Issue II]]''
** "''The Lord of the Rings'', the book and the film as seen by the students of the Adam Mickiewicz University"
** "The History of an unusual Friendship? Colin Duriez, ''Tolkien and C.S. Lewis: The Gift of Friendship''"
